/Users/r0ssar00/Development/Git/libplatform/include/libplatform.h File Reference

Includes all user-required components. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Includes all user-required components.

You must define one or more of the following to use libplatform
PL_CORE Includes the core classes
PL_DATABASE Includes the tagdb class
PL_TAGS Includes the tag access class
PL_SETTINGS Includes the settings access class
PL_DBUS Includes the DBus class
